oai_dc:dc.dc:title: CINTIL-Corpus Internacional do PortuguÃªs
oai_dc:dc.dc:description: CINTIL-Corpus Internacional do PortuguÃªs is a linguistically interpreted corpus of Portuguese. At present it is composed of 1 Million annotated tokens, verified by human expert annotators. The annotation comprises information on part-of-speech, open classes lemma and inflection, multi-word expressions pertaining to the class of adverbs and to the closed POS classes, and multi-word proper names (for named entity recognition). The corpus has been developed at the University of Lisbon by the NLX group at the Faculty of Sciences and the Anagrama group at the Cenro de LinguÃ­stica da Universidade de Lisboa.
